mapper.select: select * from( select rownum as rnum, x.* from( select godr_num,goods_reviews.god_num,god_name,godc_name,god_listimageurl,user_id,godr_writingdate,satislevel,godr_content from goods_reviews join goods on (goods_reviews.god_num = goods.god_num) join goods_categories on (goods.godc_num = goods_categories.godc_num) order by godr_num desc )x where rownum <= #{rowCnt}*#{currentPage} )where rnum > #{rowCnt}*(#{currentPage}-1)
